Class IColor.HueEasing

java.lang.Object
com.behreajj.camzup.core.IColor.HueEasing
All Implemented Interfaces:
Utils.EasingFuncPrm<Float>, Utils.TriFunction<Float,Float,Float,Float>
Direct Known Subclasses:
IColor.HueCCW, IColor.HueCW, IColor.HueFar, IColor.HueNear
Enclosing interface:
IColor
public abstract static class IColor.HueEasing extends Object implements Utils.EasingFuncPrm<Float>
An abstract parent class for hue easing functions.
